i love to go hiking.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a writer and artist, how are you?
Hello! I'm doing good, thanks for asking. I'm a chef and I love to cook. What kind of art do you do?
I love to paint and draw. I'm really into anime and video game art.
That's awesome! I've been wanting to get into drawing more, but I'm not very good.
It's a lot of fun, and you can learn a lot from practice. Do you have any favorite video games?
I love the Mortal Kombat series. My favorite character is Mileena.
Oh cool, I love that series too! I'm a big fan of Sub Zero.
Sub Zero is a great character. I like his icy powers.
Yeah, they're really cool. Do you like to go hiking?
I love hiking! I try to go as often as I can.
That's great! I love being in the mountains. It's so peaceful and beautiful.
Me too! I love the fresh air and the exercise.
Do you have any favorite hiking spots?
I love hiking in the Smoky Mountains. It's so beautiful there
